tachyon.client.block

Class TachyonBlockStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.client.block.TachyonBlockStore

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class TachyonBlockStore
extends Object
    Tachyon Block Store client. This is an internal client for all block level operations in Tachyon. An instance of this class can be obtained via get(). The methods in this class are completely opaque to user input.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static TachyonBlockStore get()
        Returns:
        a new instance of Tachyon block store

      • getInfo

        public BlockInfo getInfo(long blockId)
                  throws IOException
        Gets the block info of a block, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        blockId - the blockId to obtain information about
        Returns:
        a BlockInfo containing the metadata of the block
        Throws:
        IOException - if the block does not exist

      • getWorkerInfoList

        public List<BlockWorkerInfo> getWorkerInfoList()
                                        throws IOException,
                                               TachyonException
        Returns:
        the info of all active block workers
        Throws:
        IOException - when work info list cannot be obtained from master
        TachyonException - if network connection failed

      • getInStream

        public BufferedBlockInStream getInStream(long blockId)
                                  throws IOException
        Gets a stream to read the data of a block. The stream is backed by Tachyon storage.
        Parameters:
        blockId - the block to read from
        Returns:
        a BlockInStream which can be used to read the data in a streaming fashion
        Throws:
        IOException - if the block does not exist

      • getOutStream

        public BufferedBlockOutStream getOutStream(long blockId,
                                           long blockSize,
                                           NetAddress address)
                                    throws IOException
        Gets a stream to write data to a block. The stream can only be backed by Tachyon storage.
        Parameters:
        blockId - the block to write
        blockSize - the standard block size to write, or -1 if the block already exists (and this stream is just storing the block in Tachyon again)
        address - the address of the worker to write the block to, fails if the worker cannot serve the request
        Returns:
        a BufferedBlockOutStream which can be used to write data to the block in a streaming fashion
        Throws:
        IOException - if the block cannot be written

      • getCapacityBytes

        public long getCapacityBytes()
                      throws IOException
        Gets the total capacity of Tachyon's BlockStore.
        Returns:
        the capacity in bytes
        Throws:
        IOException - when the connection to the client fails

      • getUsedBytes

        public long getUsedBytes()
                  throws IOException
        Gets the used bytes of Tachyon's BlockStore.
        Returns:
        the used bytes of Tachyon's BlockStore
        Throws:
        IOException - when the connection to the client fails

      • promote

        public void promote(long blockId)
             throws IOException
        Attempts to promote a block in Tachyon space. If the block is not present, this method will return without an error. If the block is present in multiple workers, only one worker will receive the promotion request.
        Parameters:
        blockId - the id of the block to promote
        Throws:
        IOException - if the block does not exist
